statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, vendor_name FROM PurchaseOrders;
SELECT vendor_name, total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, vendor_name, total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vendor_name, status, total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM PurchaseOrders GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 10000;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' AND status != 'Cancelled' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM PurchaseOrders GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING AVG(total_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT vendor_name, total_amount FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price <= 50.00;
SELECT vendor_name, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY vendor_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_orders > 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory ORDER BY unit_price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT po_number, vendor_name, order_date, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand > 0 ORDER BY unit_price;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, supplier_id, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand > 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, unit_of_measure FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 5000;
SELECT order_item_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM order_items WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT supplier_id, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_of_measure, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE oi.order_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, supplier_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_on_hand, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.product_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_name, quantity FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id GROUP BY supplier_name, supplier_address;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
